name: ShortFused
description:
Grab the rope and drag it around to leave a gunpowder trail. 
Make loops around coins to collect them.

When the burning point touches a coin it will also collect them.

Find barrels to explode coins in the surrounding area!

And more!

Features 10 hand-crafted levels made with <3

Credits
